body:
This PR adds the updated Python bindings for the latest version of preCICE (2.2.1, https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/23743) and a bugfix release of `pyprecice`

The following changes have been made to the Spack recipe:
- Added version 2.2.1.1 of `pyprecice` 
    - Therefore `precice@2.2.1` was added as dependency
- Added bugfix release 2.2.0.2 of `pyprecice`
- Added @IshaanDesai as maintainer of the Spack recipe. Ishaan is one of the developers of `pyprecice`.

Adding @BenjaminRodenberg for reference.
title: py-pyprecice: Add version 2.2.0.2 and 2.2.1.1
